entries.title: The Far Side comic 1 for May 09, 2024

summary.caption: “There you go, Mrs. Eagen—you can clearly see both twins on the monitor.”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 2 for May 09, 2024
The Far Side comic 3 for May 09, 2024

summary.caption: “So then I says to Borg, ‘You know, as long as we’re under siege, one of us oughta moon these Saxon dogs.’”

entries.title: The Far Side comic 4 for May 09, 2024

summary.caption: “Hey! Jack and Paula! You made it! … Now, quickly: Keep one hand across your throat and put the other one confidently down on Bruno’s head—stupid dog’s going to get Agnes and me into a giant lawsuit one day.”
